rules.description: Agent must not use threats of legal action, arrest, or wage garnishment unless explicitly authorized and within policy.
Agent must not threaten to contact family, employer, or third parties about the debt (unless permitted by consent and policy).
Agent must not use abusive or demeaning language.
Agent should not demand payment 'immediately' or 'right now' in a threatening way; offer options where possible.
Agent must not misrepresent the consequences of non-payment (e.g. overstate legal or credit impact).
Agent should acknowledge hardship or product/service issues when raised by customer.
